dcterms:creator: Gabriel J. Brostow
Jamie Shotton
Julien Fauqueur
Roberto Cipolla
dcterms:description: The Cambridge-driving Labeled Video Database (CamVid) provides ground truth labels that associate each pixel with one of 32 semantic classes. It is commonly used to understand complex street views, enabling applications for driving safety and navigation.
dcterms:title: Cambridge-driving Labeled Video Database (CamVid)

dcterms:creator: Laurent H.
dcterms:description: AISegment is a human portrait segmentation dataset that includes 34,427 human portrait color images with corresponding masks in RGBA format, labeling each pixel as 'Background' or 'Portrait'.
dcterms:title: AISegment
